text:
Defamation Order 2018

I make the following order under section 35(3) of the Defamation Act 2005 .

17 May 2018

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Justice

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Defamation Order 2018 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 July 2018.

3. Maximum damages amount
    For the purposes of section 35(1) of the Defamation Act 2005 , the maximum damages amount that is to apply from 1 July 2018 is declared to be $398 500.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 30 May 2018
